tool_description: Analyzes time-based trends in social media metrics to identify patterns, seasonality, and growth trajectories.

forecast_periods.description: Number of future periods to forecast (0-30)

error_messages: Insufficient time series data: Minimum 7 data points required for trend analysis
Invalid analysis period: Period must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly]
Invalid sensitivity value: Trend detection sensitivity must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Irregular time intervals: Time series data contains inconsistent time intervals
Invalid forecast periods: Forecast periods must be between 0 and 30
usage: Provide time_series_data with timestamps and analysis_period. Optionally adjust trend_detection_sensitivity, enable seasonality analysis, and specify forecast_periods for predictions.
